Has anyone ever heard the pirate's tale of Peter the Great?
Alright, so there was this French guy named Peter the Great. Well, "the Great" wasn't his last name, we'll get to that. He was a well known pirate at this point, but not a fabled leader yet.
So Peter had a crew of 29 men on a large canoe-like boat. Like me after this game, they had suffered failure after failure. They were on their last rope.
Starving, exasperated, and exhausted, Peter's crew hunted for a Spanish merchant vessel not far from the island of Hispaniola. Their provisions were giving out.
Peter's men were on the brink of despair, when they sighted a large ship in the distant waters. They pooled the last of their strength together and paddled their giant canoe to the ship.
To the dismay of the pirates, the ship they found was a war vessel of the Spanish fleet. It was as if a lion sensed a big ol' fat deer, but instead pounced on an colossal elephant.
To Peter, their only option was clear. They could either ambush and capture the warship, or die alone in the ocean with empty bellies.
The Spanish captain paid little attention to Peter and his seemingly insignificant canoe as they approached. He decided to haul them on deck and question them if they came closer, but nothing more.
Peter waited until nightfall to approach the ship undetected. He sawed a hole into the canoe so it would sink as they boarded. The pirates would have no escape, except by death.
The pirates climbed the ship like cats, and pounced on the unsuspecting Spaniards. They were stupefied. It appeared these men were demons who had dropped from the sky!
The Spaniards who fought were quickly cut down by desperate, starving pirates. The rest surrendered without a fight. The ship was theirs!
Peter the Great had earned his title. He later sailed back to France and retired a gentleman of wealth and leisure.

I hope you enjoyed the show, because you won't get the luxury of beating me again!
Anyway, that's how the fastest runner on no legs does it!
You better not tell your friends about this! I WILL find out!
I shouldn't ever say this line. Please bug report this if you see it.
That shit was easy. Were you even trying?!
This was a huge waste of time. Now I'm horny for nothing.
Am I supposed to feel happy about winning this or something? Meh.
Winning this stupid game doesn't suddenly make me fulfilled.
I didn' wants t' loot me legs off, but it did end up winnin' me th' game. Worth it.
I shouldn't 'ave had t' loot off me legs t' win th' game. I needs t' do better.
Is that really the best you all can do? That was too easy.
Wow. I need to find some people that actually know how to play this game.
Flawless!
But I only took off my shoes. That was anticlimactic.
You'll have to do better than that if you want to see me take off more than just my shoes.
That was easier than I expected.
Were you trying to see me naked? Sorry to disappoint. I'm just too good.
What fun is strip poker if I'm basically only taking off my skirt? Do better next time!
Damn right! I'm Emi Ibarazaki, fastest thing on no legs! I don't stop for anything!
Well, you got me down to my underwear. It's a start.
Didn't even break a sweat.
Well at least you got to see my tits, right?
Not many people get to see my chest, so take that as a consolation prize.
That was close. You almost had me.
You did pretty well, but not well enough to beat me.
You literally had me on my last leg.
I may have won the game, but I still lost way too many rounds...
I didn't want to take my legs off, but it did end up winning me the game. Worth it.
I shouldn't have had to take off my legs to win the game. I need to do better.

Did you ever hear the tragedy of Dark Pit The Wise? I thought not. It’s not a story the Mods would tell you. It’s a SPNATI legend. Dark Pit was a Dark Angel of the Inventory, so powerful and so wise he could use the CE to influence the game’s code to create characters… He had such a knowledge of python that he could even keep the ones he cared about from getting culled. The dark side of the CE is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. He became so powerful… the only thing he was afraid of was losing his power, which eventually, of course, he did. Unfortunately, he taught Moon everything he knew, then she culled him in his sleep. Ironic. He could save others from getting culled, but not himself.
Lightning round! No, I didn't think I could finish it so quickly, either!
All done! Well, not really, but the game's over and I'm ready to go home!
I would have liked more time to finish—actually, who am I kidding? I don't have to paint anymore!
You can't rush art, but luckily, I don't know how to make art!
This is what happens when you give a clueless runner a paintbrush and only five minutes to make something with it!
Alright, game's over, this is good enough. Behold!
With more time this would have been way better than Rin's, I assure you!
Oh? We're done? Okay then, here's what I've got. Pretty awesome, isn't it?
Call me the fastest painter on no legs!
No matter how awful it looks, I still get to go running with Rin, so it's worth it!
All done! Impressed? No? That's fine! I'll just make fun of you on the track.
If you judge a fish on how it climbs a tree, it...can't...climb the...uhh, whatever. It's done!
Behold! The greatest piece of art that ever lived! Next bid starts at one million yen!
Those aren't shoes, I just couldn't get the feet to look right.
I think I captured Rin's essence perfectly. Or...at least I got the tie...kind of right?
All finished! I'm the next Piccolo, aren't I?
Like looking at a photograph of me and my buddy, right?
I expect to see this hanging up in the bar the next time we play!
Call the art museum, I think we've got the next wonder of the world on our hands!
Aye! Hang th' black flag at th' end o' th' mast! I'll giv' ye a taste o' the cat, ye cowardly, back-stabbin' codfish!
I can nah believe I lost t' ~name~.
Don't any o' ye get used t' this. I don't fancy losin' kindly.
Wha' a pathetic performance. Ye're better than this, Emi.
What a bilge-sucking, clap o' thunderin', grog blossomin', keelhaul hornswagglin', landlubberin' bottom dweller of a game.
Okay ~player~, Mr. "Big Winner," how good are you at winning? Think you could beat me in a race? Let's find out!
You seem pretty confident, ~player~. Think your luck would hold up on the track? I bet you can't beat me there!
I bet you couldn't beat me in a race, ~player~. Your luck won't help you there!
Second place is just the first loser. Well, last loser in the case of this game, I suppose.
At least I wasn't the first to go down. It's not much of an extra comfort, though. I'd rather win.
Second place isn't good enough. Nobody remembers the guy who finishes second after Usain Bolt.
Don't ask me to come again if this is all we're gonna do.
Wow. You won. Congrats. Want a medal?
Anyone got a light?
Now I can finally go home. This place has nothing on a palace.
If nothing else, at least I got off.
Imagine losing a game as dumb as this!
I can't believe I lost to ~name~.
Don't any of you get used to this. I don't take losing kindly.
What a pathetic performance. You're better than this, Emi.
I want a rematch. Now.
I won't accept anything other than victory.
You played well, ~name~. I just wish I had made it a little harder for you.
Whatever. I'll win the next one.
I hope you savor your win, ~name~. I don't lose very often.
All done! Impressed? No? That's fine! I'll just make fun of you on the track.
If you judge a fish on how it climbs a tree, it...can't...climb the...uhh, whatever. It's done!
Behold! The greatest piece of art that ever lived! Next bid starts at one million yen!
Those aren't shoes, I just couldn't get the feet to look right.
I think I captured Rin's essence perfectly. Or...at least I got the tie...kind of right?
All finished! I'm the next Piccolo, aren't I?
Like looking at a photograph of me and my buddy, right?
I expect to see this hanging up in the bar the next time we play!
Call the art museum, I think we've got the next wonder of the world on our hands!
Yeah, alright. Even painting's better than staring at ~player~ and company awkwardly stare at each other!
Sure thing, Rin. What else do I have to lose? My dignity?
Okay, Rin. Let's do it. ~Player~, hide your eyes. I don't want to blind you with my incredible art work!
Well, I can't really say no to you, Rin. It's not like I got anything else to do, now.
Okay, so...where to begin. The head? The feet? Her feet are pretty important, should I focus on them first?
So...how can I avoid looking like I've never picked up a paintbrush before in my life?
Should I start with a background or just...go for it? How does Rin even make these decisions?
When running a race, the gun goes off, and you're going. No ifs or buts about it. This is so...uncertain by comparison!
I was the kindergartener who always colored outside the lines, so this is a big step for me!
If only there were a "How to draw Rin" guide somewhere...
I can already tell I'm going to get super restless here...with nothing to do but stare at this canvas...
How do you sit still for this long, Rin? It hasn't even been five minutes and I'm already struggling!
Go ahead, you stupid canvas. Laugh at my ineptitude! I'll have the last laugh when you look terrible in front of all your...canvas buddies...
Isn't painting supposed to be a calm, relaxing activity? All I feel is inadequacy and dread.
I don't know where these art supplies came from either, ~player~. Quit asking and enjoy my misery already!
You'll have to clue me in on what I missed, ~player~, I'm too wrapped up into this to pay attention to anything else.
Should I paint her painting me? Or maybe her painting me, painting her, painting me? Ach! I can't even think straight!
Why doesn't the brush ever go where I want it to? It's like drawing with a wet noodle!
The last art teacher I had was more interested in scolding me for talking too much than actually teaching me anything. That class was such a bore.
How do I draw hair? Seriously, it sounds so easy, but this is looking like a bird's nest so far...
Rihh? Ish ith pothible thah erathe painth??
What's next, Rin? A macaroni art competition?
Heheheh...I'm gonna push her so hard on the track after this...
Why does orange look so poopy and gross when you mix it with anything?!
This is all gonna be worth it. I'll finally get Rin to break a sweat...
Wait...when did that get there? I haven't even touched that spot yet!
Unbeliethable...thith shtuff never comth off...
Maybe your art teacher can use my work as punishment for misbehavior. "Stare at Emi's art and think about what you did!"
Rin, you're gonna be so embarrassed when my crap drawing blows yours out of the water!
How am I supposed to knock your socks off with my art if you never wear socks, Rin?
Shith! Ith dripping all over the plathe!
Who knew it would be so difficult to draw a tie? They're so simple! At least, I thought they were...
Sorry, ~player~, did you say something? I'm a little preoccupied here.
I have no idea what I'm doing.
This doesn't look anything like her.
Wouldn't Rin look better with machine guns for hands? It's so tempting...
I regret using this color. I regret it so much.
Don't ask me to paint your nails, Rin. You'd be better off hiring a blind monkey.
Is her head too big? Or have I just been staring at it for too long?
I juth gottha geth this painth drip off of thith...then ith will look good!
I think it looks worse than when I started. Maybe I should just smear the paint all over the place and call it abstract.
You won't need to worry about me becoming a starving artist any time soon, Rin.
This just doesn't feel right without having a perm.
Am I a toddler? It looks like a toddler made this.
Rin would sooner take a nap on the track than run on it. I don't think I've ever seen her take both feet off the ground at the same time!
Okay, so maybe Rin's drawing was little more technically impressive, but mine had the heart!
Alright, so now that's over with. We're gonna need to carb up tonight to get ready for our workout, Rin!
What? You didn't like my drawing, ~player~? I thought put Rin in a bold and brash light.
You better not paint over that canvas, Rin. That drawing of you must haunt your dreams for the rest of your days!
So...Rin, how do you know when a painting is finished? I just sorta called it done when you said you were finished...
So what did I miss, ~player~? I wasn't paying attention to anything but that, uhh...let's just call it a pièce de résistance.

scene.name: Track
scene.directive: After losing Emi's bet, I decided to keep my word and meet her at the track for a race.
Hey ~player~! You're here!
I had a feeling you were going to wimp out on me! I'm glad you proved me wrong.
Emi bounces up and down with excitement. She has her running legs on, giving a passing impression of standing on springs.
So...that game was...absurd, right? Not the kind of poker that I'm used to!
Not that I couldn't handle it. It was fun, all things considered!
So, about our race, I was thinking. Maybe we shou--
Hey Emi. Cap said you were looking for his gloves?
Huh? Oh! Yeah! Yes I was!
I think I have them in my room somewhere. Want me to bring them to you later?
Yes! Thanks, Miki! That would be great!
Cool.
So, who's this?
This unlucky guy is ~player~! He's a friend.
Oh, so this is ~player~?
She's been talking a lot about you.
Well, of course! He lost a bet, and now he owes me a race.
Hahaha!
How unfortunate for him.
Well, as I was just telling him, I think I have something better in mind. A race between us wouldn't really be that exciting...
Are you sure? I think it'd be pretty entertaining to watch ~player~'s pride collapse.
No! That would be mean!
Well that's very generous of you, Emi.
Trust me, ~player~, she's doing you a favor.
Well I'll leave you two to it.
I'll hit you up when I find what you're looking for.
My room is a shit show right now...so it might take a while.
No worries. Thank you!
Have fun!
Bye, Miki!
Let's go back to my place.
Wait here while I get changed, and then we'll get going.

scene.name: Hallway
scene.directive: Emi changed and walked me to the dormitories. On the way, we had a conversation about workout routines and our favorite post-workout dinners.
When we arrived at the building, a strange male student stopped us.
He gave us an incessant rant about feminist conspiracy theories.
Thankfully, Emi was able to shoo him away by telling him she was "riding the crimson wave" and needed to rush inside.
Well, here we are!
...Sorry about him. I'm not really sure what his deal is.
Anyway, come on in! And take off your shoes, please!

scene.name: Bedroom
scene.directive: So, about that poker game...
I'm not really one to flaunt what I got and go home empty-handed.
But getting physical at that place is a big no-no.
So here's what I propose!
For every five pushups you do, I'll take off an article of clothing!
She can't be serious...
And when I've run out of things to take off, we'll see what happens.
She is....
The sooner you start, the sooner I'll be naked!
Okay, first of all, your form's all wrong.
You'll screw up your shoulders if you flare out your elbows like that!
Try keeping your elbows closer to your side.
Okay, one more thing.
Make sure you're using a full range of motion. Your chest isn't touching the ground.
Nice! That's much better!
Is my sexy underwear making you blush?
I know, black or red is usually the go-to for lingerie, but blue is my favorite color!
Wanna skip ahead a little?
"Here, you're looking a little underexposed now. Let me fix that."
"Tee hee!"
"Omigosh you're blushing so much, ~player~!"
"Oooh, keep doing that."
"Eeep!"
"Hold on, ~player~, let me get warmed up first..."
"MMmmmm. This is nice..."
Many moments later...
Ahh! Hmmm! Omigosh!
Holy shit, you feel amazing!
Fuck, ~player~ don't stop!!
*Knock knock!*
Hey Emi I found th--
Woah.
What the hell, Miki?! Why would you just barge in like that?!
I knocked!
Who knocks and then immediately comes in?!
I'd prefer you wait for an answer, Miki.
I thought you might want this sooner rather than later, considering...
I did, but not now! I wasn't asking to get interrupted!
I'm disappointed in you, Emi.
That's rich, knowing what you like to do in your free time...
Nonono that's not what I meant!
I'm just disappointed that you didn't invite me.
Well, you never asked!
You're here now, aren't you?
That's more like it.
...What the hell did Miki bring?
Oh!
Did Emi not clue you in?
Oh! Right!
We weren't really talking about the captain's gloves, ~player~. That's just what we like to call it.
Miki showed me what she brought for Emi.
It's..."personal lubricant." Lemon flavored.
We can't be outwardly talking about the track captain's anal lube when we're passing it around, dummy.
You say this like you have any sense of subtlety!
Oh, get over it, Emi. It's not like I haven't seen you naked before.
I'm a little surprised you want to try this again after last time with Hisao...
Well, as long as ~player~ doesn't rush things, I think it'll be fine...
Ha! Don't worry. I'll help you warm up.
Alright, let me get my birthday suit on.
How do I look?
Lets get down to business.
"Shit, Miki! You left the door open this whole time!"
"Oh, fuck me! I'm sorry!"
"And that's not even a birthday suit!"
Many moments later...

scene.name: MikiRide
scene.directive: Ohhh fuck, ~player~! Don't stop!
Hmmm! MMMmmmm!
Wait! Don't cum, ~player~, Jesus!
Emi's not done with you yet.

scene.name: Butt
scene.directive: "Ready, Emi?"
"Sigh...yeah. Let's do it."
"You better not make me sore as shit, ~player~."
"Take it slow, alright? Walk, don't sprint."
Mmmmmm.
Hmmmf!
So...
Are you going to try moving, or are we just going to sit here feeling silly?
Oooohhhh...
OOOhhh ~player~...
Can you go...a little faster?
OOHHh my gosh...
Ahhh! OOhhh, ~player~!
Thhis actually ffeells...nice, I think? Oommf!
Harder, ~player~! Fuck me! Fucking cum inside of me ~player~!
HHhmmmm yes, yes, yes! Don't stop ~player~, don't stop!
Aaahhhhh yeah...

scene.name: AfterButt
scene.directive: I can't believe you just watched us do that.
Ha! I did more than just watch, Emi.
Could you get me a towel? It's...leaking out of me.
Yeah I gotchu.
"Thank you."
"I brought something else for us to do, by the way."
Some time later...

scene.name: Weed
scene.directive: I probably should be studying for calculus tonight...
Math is for gaylords. I'd rather smoke weed.
I know you would.
Come on, Emi! You need to let loose once in a while!
I won't be the best that I can be if I'm not putting in my all.
You can be at your best and still have fun sometimes! Live a little!
You're not gonna stop kicking ass just by taking a day off every once in a while.
You're right.
Thanks, Miki.
This was great. Let's do this again soon.
Yeah, okay. But let's skip the anal next time...
Miki, I can't see...
Open the window.
Sure thing. I'll just open the window that I can't see!
I don't even remember if you have a window at all...
How can your window be real, if our eyes aren't real?
I feel like I'm getting squeezed by every hand in the galaxy....
I am wood.
I can't hold a can of soup, Miki...
Is your friend alright over there?
I haven't heard him say anything in ages.
~Player~? You good?
Nothing.
He's fiiiine. He's probably just...umm...savoring the moment....

scene.name: Rise And Shine
scene.directive: I feel…
I feel…dizzy...
Where am I...?
I...can’t…
...Move.
Who..did this? What...happened?
I can’t…
...stay awake…

scene.name: Office
scene.directive: Cap'n, we've got a situ—
Aye! What happened in here!? It’s a mess!
Aye.
You're really hangin the jib, eh Cap'n?
Aye.
I've got a whole crew to be lookin' after. I'm the one they be lookin' at to raise their spirits.
But now, we're at rope's end, and there ain't be nothin' I can do about it. Yarrgh.
Show a leg, Cap'n! Give no quarter! This ain't the last of Captain Ibarazaki the Unrivaled! Quittin's for picaroons!
Scupper that ye ol' rotten scallywag! I ain't quittin'!
I'm just bilged on me own anchor, is all.
Aye aye! Crew's waitin' for ya down the portside quarters. Best not keep ‘em.
Aye. Ease yer’ bosom. Load the gunwales and I'll be down.

scene.name: Quarters
scene.directive: Is she running up and down the walls up there?
Huh? No. Captain's duties. As always.
It sure sounded like she was a moment ago. She's mad, isn't she?
She should be, those fuckers…
Like, I'm pissed too, but jeez, man! She gonna be alright?
When she gets this angry, I like to imagine her face turning a raspberry truffle red.
Or maybe more like an alizarin crimson? Something like the color when you're stuck in a terrifying nightmare, but every time you try to escape it, you just sink deeper.
Don’t talk about sinking.
Yarrgh. Where's the rest of crew?
It's just us, now.
Yeah. The others left for the barracks. Couldn't hold out any longer. What took you?
Nelson's folly.
Are you sure you've got everything under control? We can't take much mo--
We're taking fire!!
Wha—?
For real?!
Shit!
Fuck! We're under fire!

scene.name: Bedroom
scene.directive: Eeek!
Where am I?
Huh? Is that—me??
It can't be...
Am I still dreaming?
I look all...ghosty!
I guess Rin slept over again?
So...that must be her dream.
Now this is something I’ve got to see!

scene.name: Canvas
scene.directive: Hey, Rin!
Hi, Emi.
Umm...
This is your dream?
Yup.
And you realize you could do like, anything, Right?
Yup.
Like, seriously. Anything. Come on, Rin! You're missing out!
You think so?
I know so! I could be ten feet tall if I wanted!
Think big, Rin!
I can make—
A million of me!
Fascinating.
Well, if all you’re gonna do is paint, then I’m just gonna leave.
Okay. Bye, Emi.
Uhhh, Rin?
Yes?
How do I get out of here?
Down the hallway over here.

scene.name: Hallway
scene.directive: R-Rin? What’s...this!?
All the dreams I’ve visited. From people we’ve played with at the Inventory.
I’ve collected them with paintings.
Not the paintings, Rin. The interior! Pink and green? What were you thinking?
A beautiful interior design would steal the show.
So wait a minute, you’ve already—
Yeah...I explored the realm of dreams a long time ago.
So, um…
How did you do it?
It’s pretty simple, actually. All you have to do is hop three times and say “flank steak!”
Come on, Rin. Don’t bullshit me.
Would you rather stay here and paint with me?
Flank steak.

scene.name: Canvas Again
scene.directive: Oh...That actually worked.
I probably should have told her not to touch anything.

scene.name: Book Storm
scene.directive: Woah! That actually worked!
What a mess! It’s literally raining books in here!
Who would even think of a place like this? Maybe...?

scene.name: Bacon Books
scene.directive: Hanako! I knew it! You look great! Love the outfit! How yo—
Ah! Who are you?
Hold on, you’re not—
H-how did you get here? And can you p-please stop being so loud? This is a library...
Pfft. I thought Rin’s dream was lame.
...I’m enjoying my dream just fine, regardless of your opinion.
Wait, you know you’re dreaming, and you still choose to read in a library?
You really are like her.
It's quiet in here. School can be so hectic, that it's hard to find time for myself.
How have we even connected? I’ve never seen you at the Inventory.
The Inventory? That's the strip poker place my club members go to, I think.
Are you ever gonna join us over there?
I'd like to, but so many people have asked me to come, that I feel like I'd disappoint them no matter what I do...
I see…
Well, I’ll leave you be!
...I would appreciate that.
Flank steak.

scene.name: Skyfall
scene.directive: Hey, Emi! What's crackin'?!
Rainbow Dash!? What are you doing up here!?
I jumped out of a plane!
You what!?
Isn't this awesome?!
Well, it’s better than reading in a library!
Why would anyone want to do that?!
Right?! So how are you going to land?!
That's a good question! I haven't thought of that yet!
Why would you jump out of a plane without a way to land?!!
I don’t know, Emi! I’m making this up as I go!
Well, think fast! You’re dreaming, you can do anything!
Huh?! What are you talking about?!
Would you normally jump out of a plane without a parachute?!
That depends, are we on a mission to save Daring Do?!
Please just think of something we can use to slow us down!!
Well, that didn’t work!
Try something we can hold on to!
Good thinking, Emi!
Wait! I can't reach!
Dammit!
I need to think of something fast! I can do this! No problem!
You gotta be shitting me!

scene.name: Tea Party
scene.directive: And take this royal rose, my dear. I have hand picked it from the most decadent shrubbery in my garden.
The bush whence it came was meticulously pruned for months by my expert servants to provide you the most beautiful blossom in all of Hazukashii!
Nn! I love it!! I will cherish it forever, my salty sunflower!
Only the finest is worthy of you, my princess!
Babe, wait! Don’t marry him! Take this handsome man instead!
I climbed that mountain over there to find this rare flower for ya.
I don’t know what it is, but it looks pretty to me, and it reminded me of you!
Oh, senpai! How unbelievably sweet of you!
B-but my lady! He’s not even a prince! You can’t seriously consi—
I’d climb ten mountains to make ya happy. Who cares about some dumb king or queen?
Marry me, Natsuki!
Preposterous! You shan’t marry a man with such a gross distaste for eloquence!
Uu! Boys! Please! Don’t fight over me!! I-I don’t know what to--
Woah woah, what?
Forsooth, a woman from the sky?
Ow!
Natsuki? Is this your dream?
Aww, it’s so cute!
C-cute? No— no— t-this isn’t my dream! This is...someone else’s! A nightmare! A total nightmare!!
You think I would dream something as sappy and cutesy as this!? N-no way! Not me!!
T-this is Penly’s twisted fantasy! Not mine!!
Woah—hey there, toots. I still wanna smooch ya, but don’t go blaming me for this.
Uhh…Penly??
I’m sorry, am I interrupting something?
Nnnn! No! T-this is nothing! Get me out of here! I hate this!
Madam of the sky, are you the fallen angel that was promised? I must know your name!
Nigel, you slut!!
You told me you love me! And now you want to run off with her!?
I-I’m sorry, my princess, I—
Yeah, screw you, Nigel! I still love ya Natsuki, my sweet kitten!
I’mnotakitten!!
I-I don’t—
Mr. Bobblesquat, I must necessitate you to address me by my full title.
I am Prince Nigel Pinkleberry, Lord Protector of Hazukashii, first of his name!
I think I’ve had enough of this…
Flank steak!
You’ll be the last of his name when I’m through with ya!
No, Penly!! Don’t hurt him!
You would desecrate this sacred venue with violence?!
Quit it! The tea is gonna get cold!!

scene.name: Brimstone
scene.directive: Euuugh!! It smells like death’s anus up here! How could a dream smell so bad!?
I smell...sulfur...and something awful burning!
It’s like a demon puked on a 1920’s fantasy metropolis. Big curly spires, and, are those zeppelins?
Who the hell is dreaming of this place, evil Dumbledore?
Fufufufufu!
Holy shit!!
Well now, what do we have here? A little insect crawling in my domain?
Uh, nope! Insects have six legs, and as you may know, I don’t have any!
Er, so I see… Well then, what are you doing here?
You dress rather strange, so I assume you are not from my glorious nation.
I’m a visitor from a world called “real life,” and I’m here to teach you about a wonderful concept called “air fresheners!” Ever heard of them?
Are you some kind of clown? You should work on your jokes.
You are in the presence of the all powerful Dark Deity of Destruction, Megumin!
Maybe Natsuki’s bachelor party wasn’t as bad as I thought…
I’m growing tired of your peculiar antics.
Perhaps I should use you as target practice during our next mandatory explosion training?
Bring it on. You might find it difficult to catch me!
Wait, if I die in a dream, will I die in real life? Hasn’t seemed to matter yet...
I am well aware my dark utopia is like a dream come true, but rest assured you will not die.
You may gain a few scorch marks, but I hear they build character.
Plus, scars are really cool!
You’re selling me on the idea, but I doubt I’ll still have them when I wake up…
Wake up? No, this <i>can’t<i> be a dream.
Look upon my glorious domain! The millions who bow their heads before my awesome power!
Yeah, that’s pretty easy to do in a dream.
Want me to shower you with fans? I'll show you...
Hold on, I need to concentrate on this…
Aw, dammit! Lemons again? Why is it always lemons?!
AH! Foul acidic fruit! What kind of pointless spell is that!?
Weren’t you supposed to summon fans?
I’m trying my best! It’s not easy when you’re in someone else’s dream!
I mean, I was able to do it fine in Rin’s dream...maybe because we’re sleeping so close to each other?
Is this...really a dream?
I suppose Kazuma was being more obedient than normal… and Darkness wasn’t being a hopeless pervert…
GASP! And Aqua was doing her chores without complaining!!! This really IS a dream!!!
It’s not exactly a big deal, it’s just—
My beautiful empire of shadows, my legion of minions, all just a dream…
I had finally obtained the pinnacle of Explosion, and it's...I'm useless...
Well...you could still achieve the uhh, big explosion or whatever. It’s your dream.
You’re right!
If this is a dream I can make the biggest explosion the world—no—the UNIVERSE has ever seen! I can destroy everything! HAHAHAHAHA!
Woah, hold on! I’m still here, Megumin! I don’t know how this dream surfing stuff wor—

scene.name: Kaboom!
scene.directive: Darkness blacker than black, darker than dark! The time of awakening hath come!
From the boundaries of righteousness come all justice as an intangible distortion!
Dance, dance! Dance!! Transform my torrent of power into a destructive force! One without equal!
Return all of creation to cinders and rise from the abyss! Grant your humble servant the most powerful attack ever known!
EEEEEEEXPLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOSIOOOOOOON!!!

scene.name: Collapse
scene.directive: Shit! Shit! Shit!

scene.name: Canvas'nt
scene.directive: Rin I really screwed up!! RUN!!!
What did you do?!

scene.name: Dream Space X
scene.directive: H—huh??
Am...am I dead?
The explosion...
...everything just started collapsing, and—
You think you’re clever, huh?
Running around in everyone’s dreams, putting strain on the very fabric of dream space.
You think it was designed for that stuff? Huh?
Wh—
You know how long it’s going to take me to fix this mess you made!?
I—
Eons! Literally eons!
Running around talking to all the godly animal beings and listening to The Deep Hollow Hollerers was bad enough, but now this?
Bu—
And your ass won’t even notice more than an instant has passed once you’re out of here!
Your material plane ass, of course!
Ididn’tmeanto—
Ohh, I saw what you did.
These crazy, horrible nightmare eyes see everything.
Snoopin’ on everyone’s private time, talking an Arch Wizard of the Crimson Demon Clan into unleashing a trancensial explosion spell in an already weakened ethereal dimension!
We—
I’d banish your dumbass in here for eternity if regulations allowed it.
But I still gotta follow these stupid rules anyways.
Nevertheless, you’ll be permanently exiled into your own dreamspace.
Ironic.
How a feeble, impotent mortal like you even managed to transit the ethereal plane is beyond me. Don’t try it again.
Ugh, dumb humans.
Playing cards with them was the biggest mistake.

scene.name: Chains
scene.directive: I’m...still here?
...How long have I been out?
Rise and shine, ~player~!
Er...I mean...Ahoy! Avast ye and hang the Jib!
...What…
Ah, fuck it. Not in the mood.
You’re probably wondering why you’re chained up in my quarters.
She did this?!
I would apologize, but you’re just a figment of my imagination, so it doesn’t really matter.
What is she talking about!?
I mean, honestly, you deserve it anyway. I can’t believe you had the nerve to try so hard at a game of strip poker!
I was just going to leave you here as my prisoner, but...I’ve kinda been quarantined to my own dream.
Forever.
So I may as well make the most of the situation.
A...dream?
Yes, ~player~. You’re in my dream.
I’m getting tired of explaining it at this point.
Basically, anything goes. I can be whatever I want. A pirate!
A football player!
A starfish!
Actually, that’s not a good idea. No one wants a starfish in bed!
Since you’re so clever enough to beat me at poker, you can probably guess where this is going.
You think this is the part where we get all lovey dovey, huh?
Well, you’re half right…
But this time…
I’m in control.
I could simply snap my fingers and make all your troubles cease to exist.
I could...burden myself with chronic back pain...
I could gang bang you with an army of me.
I could even...
Fuck a male version of myself.
And make you watch.
Howdy there...~player~. Are my uhh, biceps making you feel...insecure?
Let me do the talking, please.

scene.name: Sauce
scene.directive: Mmmmm...I can feel his toned muscles.
His heart beating faster and faster…
The cold sweat of anticipation building up...
All you can do is wish this were you...
Nice and slowly…
Why is my dick so small?
Umm, well…
It’s not like I’ve ever been known to be well endowed...
Okay, but if you’re gonna fuck yourself as a boy, you should at least give me the tools to do it right.
I’m sorry, I don’t remember calling in an expert to scrutinize my dream.
Well, who exactly put you in charge, anyway? I’m a version of you, so doesn’t that make this my dream, too?
I wouldn’t have picked this dump for a sex dream. Who wants to bang on a bunch of wet planks with rusty nails?
It’s a sex dungeon, idiot. I’m not going to chain ~player~ up in the Taj Mahal.
I wouldn’t be very intimidated if I were chained up by a pretty girl in her underwear.
Now you just look like you’re trying too hard. If you ask me, you really ought to—
Dickhead.
Look, I’ve had a long night. So here’s what’s gonna happen.
I’m going to blow you so hard, you’ll be begging to be out of those chains so you can hold me down and fuck me like it’s your last day on Earth.
But you won’t be able to. All you can do is squirm and torture yourself with your hopeless desires.
Are you ready?

scene.name: Eggplant
scene.directive: Mmmmm…
Schlurrp…Mhmmm...
Mmm! Hmm!
Pfft. If you thought that was up to you, you haven’t been paying attention.
You’ll finish where and when I want you to, ~player~. We’re just getting started.
Don’t worry, no pushups this time.
Won’t do you any good to workout in a dream.
You’re pretty smart, ~player~.
I don’t think I need to spell out what’s next.

scene.name: Rollercoaster
scene.directive: Oohh! Yeah! Mmm!
Oh! Yes! Ohohhhh!
Mmmhmhmmm!!!
Wait, did you just—are you serious!? It’s not a race, you little shit!

scene.name: Reconcile
scene.directive: I've been struggling through twenty minutes of whimsical peril to get to this point. I played you like a clarinet. And you can't even last twelve seconds?!
Sigh…
I’m sorry. It’s not your fault. That I didn’t get there, I mean.
Truth is...I feel like I’ve been an asshole. Like, all night.
I didn’t want to think about it, but I can’t deny it anymore.
I’ve been focusing so much on what I want, that I haven’t bothered listening to anyone else.
I barged into everyone else’s dreams like I owned the place. Made a mess of everything. I didn’t even ask you what you wanted.
I thought it would be fun to chain you up and take control and everything, but you can’t really connect with someone when they can’t share their affections with you.
Sex without connection...it just feels meaningless.
But we can fix that. I can make things right.
Let me get rid of those chains.
Feel better?
So, ~player~.
What do you want to do tonight?

scene.name: PostCredits
scene.directive: Yaaaaaaawwwn…
Not bad.
You're still here?
It's over.
Go home.
Go.
